snippet: New Jersey’s current pretrial system is rigged against the poor, but two new reform bills offer some hope.
abstract: Editorial supports New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's signing of two bills aimed at reforming state's pretrial system; holds that pretrial system is currently rigged against poor residents, who cannot afford to pay bail; urges voters to pass bills, which will both make system more just and save taxpayer dollars.
lead_paragraph: New Jersey’s current pretrial system is rigged against the poor, but two new reform bills offer some hope.

headline.main: Gov. Christie Takes On the Bail Bondsmen
